mapper.select: SELECT SUBJECT, EVENT_START_DATE as eventStartDate, EVENT_END_DATE as eventEndDate, CONTENT FROM F_CALLENDER_DETAIL WHERE SPACE_NO=#{spaceNo} ORDER BY FC_DETAIL_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO F_CALLENDER_DETAIL(FC_DETAIL_NO, SPACE_NO, SPACE_MEMBER_NO, SUBJECT,EVENT_START_DATE,EVENT_END_DATE,CONTENT) VALUES (FC_DETAIL_NO_SEQ.nextval,#{spaceNo},#{spaceMemberNo},#{subject},#{eventStartDate},#{eventEndDate},#{content})
